item.title: CVE-2023-34001|2024-06-04T07:09:44.976Z -- WPPlugins – WordPress Security Plugins -- Hide My WP Ghost
item.description: Improper Restriction of Excessive Authentication Attempts vulnerability in WPPlugins – WordPress Security Plugins Hide My WP Ghost allows Functionality Bypass.This issue affects Hide My WP Ghost: from n/a through 5.0.25.
